text: == Events == * January 1 – Charles II crowned King of Scotland in Scone. This is his first crowning. * June 28 – June 30: The biggest battle of the 17th century, the Battle of Beresteczko, between Poles and Ukrainians is won by the Poles. * September 3 – English Civil War: Battle of Worcester – Charles II of England is defeated in the last main battle of the war.
